db:abstract.db:para: A QML application that demonstrates visualizing a 3D scene.

db:article.db:para: This example demonstrates visualizing a 3D scene from a Qt Quick application. The 3D scene contains a single active camera and a single active light source. Visualized data is assumed to be at a fixed location.

db:section.db:title: Running the Example
db:section.db:para: To run the example from Qt Creator, open the Welcome mode and select the example from Examples. For more information, visit Building and Running an Example.

db:section.db:title: Visualizing 3D Scenes
